Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2016 10:37PM HeidiMcC wrote: I had BMX on 11/16 with 2 drains on left and 1 on right. 7days post op BS removed both from left side. I felt nothing other than her pulling out the stitch. I am now 13 days post op and will find out Wednesday if she will remove right drain, but it's still collecting 40-50ccs daily so I doubt it will come out yet
